name: Show products by categories
author: Dudka Alexey

sections.description:
The plugin adds a unit with a list of all existing product categories, page creation and editing of pages and fasting. As well as adding a new widget that you want to add to any existing location for widgets. After selecting the desired category, and add widgets, the page will appear in a random order, only items that are included in the selected categories.

A few notes about the sections above:

  • “Contributors” is a comma separated list of wordpress.org usernames
  • “Tags” is a comma separated list of tags that apply to the plugin
  • “Requires at least” is the lowest version that the plugin will work on
  • “Tested up to” is the highest version that you’ve successfully used to test the plugin. Note that it might work on
    higher versions… this is just the highest one you’ve verified.
